content: **free for now** ------------------------------ the cowl is great mindless knitting for while you re chatting over the holidays ☻ ----------------------------------------------- there is also a matching hat - muchness hat /patterns/library/muchness-hat ----------------------------------- *i was finishing this while watching alice in wonderland hence the name * with fabulously shaded yarn often you need just the simplest of stitches to bring out its beauty - so this cowl uses just knit and purl stitches with slipped stitches for a built-in icord edge to make much muchness with very little both sides are nice so it s worth the effort of kitchenering the original is about 20 x 125 cm 8 x 50 and used a single skein there is a lot of scope for modification - just be sure to have a little extra yarn on hand many thanks to the testers opknitter /people/opknitter knittingnoodle /people/knittingnoodle knitgrl /people/knitgrl
